description:
-- Apple Design Award winner! --
Grades 3 is the ultimate app for students, putting everything you need for your courses in one place.

Features:

--A planner you will actually use--
Quickly see all your upcoming due dates and tests for the next couple weeks. Taste the joy of blissful organization.


--Reminders--
Never miss a group study or test again with automatic reminders for all to-dos and assignments. Yeah, bubba, this one is for you.


--Groups and Class Info--
Send group texts and emails right from the app. Yes, and if you really, really wanted to, you can call your professor too.


--Notes--
The Notes app is great but why not keep all your notes for each class in one place? Star important paragraphs to review later.


--Grades--
See what you need to get on your next test to get the grade you want in your class. And we've got a GPA calculator as the cherry on top.

We read every review and email and will try our best to update the app with your suggestions. We would love to hear your questions and comments; just shoot us an email at grades@tapity.com.
releaseNotes:
We are working hard on Grades 4.0 but we took quick break to bring you this update that ensures that Grades 3 will be compatible with iOS 8.

Here is what is new:
- iOS 8 compatibility
- No more iOS 6 style keyboards or controls
- Decimal keyboard in all relevant places
- Fixed the bug that crashed the app on the GPA screen
